snippet: Lawyers for David Michael Miranda, the partner of the journalist Glenn Greenwald, who has been writing about secret N.S.A. documents, said Mr. Miranda’s rights were violated.
abstract: Lawyers for David Michael Miranda, partner of journalist Glenn Greenwald, who has been writing about secret documents taken by former National Security Agency analyst Edward Snowden, appear in London High Court to challenge legality of British intelligence officials temporarily detaining Miranda and confiscating his computer and other items.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for David Michael Miranda, the partner of the journalist Glenn Greenwald, who has been writing about secret N.S.A. documents, said Mr. Miranda’s rights were violated.

headline.main: Lawyers Challenge Detention of Greenwald’s Partner in London
headline.print_headline:
Britain: Partner of Snowden Journalist
Challenges Detention in London
